parameters.name: ContainerGroupIds
parameters.description: The instance ID. The value is a JSON array. You can specify up to 20 instance IDs at a time.

parameters.name: MetricType
parameters.description: The type of the monitoring data. Set the value to summary. This value indicates that records are returned.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the elastic container instances belong.
